title: Star Trek (2009) [Ghost]
description:
MOVIE INFORMATION
_________________

Title: Star Trek
Year: 2009
IMDb rating: 8.0
Director: J.J. Abrams
Genre: Action/Adventure/Sci-Fi
Featuring Chris Pine, Eric Bana, Karl Urban
Description: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.


PRODUCT
_______

Format: DVD
Edition: Theatrical Edition, 121 minutes, Dutch retail 2009
Spoken Language: English, English
Subtitle Language: English, English
Subtitles taken from retail DVD.
Final size: 842MB (773MB video, 36,8MB audio, 30,9MB audio commentary)


CODECS AND CHANNELS
___________________

Video Codec: H264 - MPEG-4 AVC
Resolution: 720x428
Framerate: 25fps
Average Bitrate: 868kbps
Preprocessing with AviSynth script, to remove medium noise, auto-crop and convert to YV12.
Encoded with x264: program --preset placebo --tune film --crf 22.8 --deblock 3:2 --keyint infinite --min-keying 1 --open.gop --gpmin 1 --qpstep 12 --chroma-qp-offset 5 --qcomp 0.5 --rc-lookahead 250 --aq-strength 1.5 --merange 64 --non-deterministic --output "output" "input"

Audio Codec: Vorbis Audio
Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 48000Hz
Bitrate: 48kbps
Encoded with aoTuV

Audio Commentary Codec: Vorbis Audio
Channels: Stereo
Sample rate: 48000Hz
Bitrate: 36kbps
Encoded with aoTuV

Subtitles: Subrip
Source: Retail DVD
Converted to Subrip format with OCR, and slightly modified:
- Fixed italics (consistent italicizing of spaceship names, uplink communication, computer voices, narration).

Audio Commentary Subtitles: Subrip
Source: Retail DVD
Converted to Subrip format with OCR, and slightly modified:
- Fixed italics (consistent italicizing of spaceship names and entertainment titles).
